cast.overview: Jackie Chan stars as Asian Hawk, an Indiana Jones-style adventurer looking to make a fortune in exotic antiquities. After Hawk discovers a mysterious sword in Africa, a band of Satan-worshipping monks kidnap his ex-girlfriend Lorelei, demanding the sword as ransom as well as other pieces of the legendary Armour of God - a magical outfit dating back to the Crusades.
cast.title: Armour of God

details.biography: Lola Forner is a Spanish actress. She was crowned Miss Spain in 1979 and competed in Miss World 1979 and Miss Europe 1980. She is more known to the world for starring alongside action superstar Jackie Chan in the movies Wheels on Meals and Armour of God.
details.name: Lola Forner
